fields.body_template:
Hi {{ request.personal }},

Thank you! We have received your request for a Carpentries Workshop. We ask that you provide us 2-3 months advance notice of a workshop to allow sufficient time to organise a workshop. The dates you have provided are outside of our normal recruitment timeline. I will begin recruiting instructors immediately, however I cannot guarantee that we can secure instructors in time for your requested dates. Please let us know if you have flexibility with your dates.

If the instructors are confirmed, you will receive an introduction email that will explain the next steps. If instructors are not confirmed within 3 weeks, we will need to look at other dates.  Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

Best, {{ assignee }}
